organizations.title: Organizations - Nurl Sanctum Guide
organizations.description: Learn how to create and manage organizations in Nurl Sanctum. Control visibility settings, edit organization details, and organize your game content effectively.

repositories.title: Repositories - Nurl Sanctum Guide
repositories.description: Learn about repositories in Nurl Sanctum. Understand their purpose and how to use them to manage your game content.

repository-files.title: Repository Files - Nurl Sanctum Guide
repository-files.description: Learn about repository files in Nurl Sanctum. Understand the different types of files and how to use them to manage your game content.

managing-workspace-members.title: Managing Workspace Members - Nurl Sanctum Guide
managing-workspace-members.description: Discover how to manage team members in your Nurl Sanctum workspace. Add, remove, and edit member roles seamlessly.

repository-management.title: Repository Management - Nurl Sanctum Guide
repository-management.description: Learn how to create and manage repositories in Nurl Sanctum. Control visibility settings, edit repository details, and organize your game content effectively.

authentication.title: Authentication - Secure Access to Nurl Services
authentication.description: Understand Nurl's authentication process using one-time login tokens. Securely access all Nurl services with a single account.

managing-licenses.title: Managing Licenses - Nurl Sanctum Guide
managing-licenses.description: Learn how to create and manage game system licenses in Nurl Sanctum. Control permissions, restrictions, and license details for your content.

managing-permissions-and-restrictions.title: Managing Permissions & Restrictions - Nurl Sanctum Guide
managing-permissions-and-restrictions.description: Understand how to set up and manage permissions and restrictions for your game system licenses in Nurl Sanctum.

creating-a-license.title: Creating a License - Nurl Sanctum Guide
creating-a-license.description: Step-by-step guide to creating new licenses for your game systems in Nurl Sanctum. Define terms, permissions, and restrictions effectively.

licenses.title: Licenses - Nurl Sanctum Guide
licenses.description: Comprehensive overview of the licensing system in Nurl Sanctum. Understand different license types and their applications.

repository-history.title: Repository History - Nurl Sanctum Guide
repository-history.description: Track and manage the complete history of your repositories in Nurl Sanctum. View changes, revisions, and updates over time.

collaborators.title: Collaborators - Nurl Sanctum Guide
collaborators.description: Learn how to work with collaborators in your Nurl Sanctum repositories. Manage access, roles, and permissions effectively.

current-work.title: Current Work - Nurl Sanctum Guide
current-work.description: Understand how to track and manage ongoing work in your Nurl Sanctum repositories. Monitor progress and coordinate updates.

game-systems.title: Game Systems - Nurl Sanctum Guide
game-systems.description: Learn how to create, extend, and manage game systems in Nurl Sanctum. Build and customize your gaming content effectively.

dice-workshop.title: Dice Workshop - Nurl Sanctum Guide
dice-workshop.description: Learn how to create, extend, and manage dice in Nurl Sanctum. Build and customize your gaming content effectively.
